title: Spomenik Database
subtitle: Here we see the old Yugoslav-era Hotel Lokve at Lokve Ski Resort in Montenegro, by architect Radosav Zeković, modeled after the traditional cone-shaped katun (huts) of the Dinaric Alps. Today it continues to house refugees from the 90s war. For more info: http://SpomenikDatabase.org/berane pic.twitter.com/E04ObEOtTI
